resources.string: For the best pizza in Crowley, Texas try JR\'s Pizza. If you like pepperoni pizza, or pizza with the works, a supreme pizza, or a cheese pizza, JR\'s Pizza Crowley is here for you. If you like real beef hamburgers you\'ve come to the right place. Or maybe you\'re in the mood for a fresh salad, pasta, or one of our delicious burritos. We have those on the menu too.
To look at our Menu, tap below:
